rows.label: qst201804_msg0001
rows.name:
What, you again? I told you
I have nothing to say.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0002
rows.name: I'm sorry about before.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0003
rows.name:
Here, this is a souvenir.
Would you like some?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0004
rows.name: Oh, this is a Pinfin!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0005
rows.name: I-It's not poisoned, is it...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0006
rows.name:
I wouldn't do that! Please
eat with confidence!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0007
rows.name: I see. In that case...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0008
rows.name:
Hey everyone! We've got
lots of Pinfins to eat!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0009
rows.name: Phew... that was good. I'm satisfied.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0010
rows.name: You're a pretty good person.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0011
rows.name:
Alright, as thanks for the delicious
Pinfins, I'll tell you anything.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0012
rows.name: What do you want to know?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0013
rows.name:
Actually, I'm looking for
a Phonex named Pepe...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0014
rows.name: Do you know anything about him?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0015
rows.name: Pepe? Of course I know him.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0016
rows.name: You do?!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0017
rows.name:
He and Mimi left the
settlement and didn't come
back for a long time...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0018
rows.name:
Then, the other day, Pepe
came back alone. I was
relieved he seemed fine.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0019
rows.name: Um, so where is Pepe-san now?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0020
rows.name:
Ah, he said he was going
to another country and
left with a few friends.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0021
rows.name:
Why? Did you hear what
he was going to do?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0022
rows.name:
I heard he was gathering strong
friends, but I don't know the details.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0023
rows.name:
I heard he was boarding
a ship to Invidia...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0024
rows.name:
You should ask the Phonexes in the
settlement over there for details.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0025
rows.name: Invidia? Not Superbia?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0026
rows.name:
That's right, Invidia.
No doubt about it.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0027
rows.name:
Aww, I really thought
it would be Superbia.

rows.label: qst201804_msg0028
rows.name: ...Why are you so disappointed, mo?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0029
rows.name: No! But maybe!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0030
rows.name:
When they arrived, they might have
been targeted by the Superbians!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0031
rows.name:
...How did you come to
that conclusion, mo?

rows.label: qst201804_msg0032
rows.name:
I'm sure of it! Let's go
help them right away!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0033
rows.name:
Calm down, Uka. Your imagination
is running a bit wild...

rows.label: qst201804_msg0034
rows.name:
It'll be too late if something
happens! We must prevent it!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0035
rows.name:
Everyone! We're leaving
for Invidia immediately!

rows.label: qst201804_msg0036
rows.name:
Let's find the Phonex settlement
there and ask them for information!
